channel.title: R.I.P Eddie Murphy
channel.description:
Guys, one of my favorite people died today in a skiing accident. Here's the story:
Eddie Murphy was killed today due to a tragic accident in the Alps. Earlier in the day he was complaining of chest pains but decided to keep on Skiing on the trip with his wife and children. Sources say at around 6PM tonight he had lost control and collided with a ski lift pole traveling at very high speeds. Some are speculating that he suffered a fatal heart attack before colliding, but it is not known for certain. More information will be coming in as the day rolls on.
Everyone show some respect for this great man and post a remembrance post. Here's a video that I found in respect of his death: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SI4E6JO1KVU]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SI4E6JO1KVU[/url] [size=24pt]R.I.P Eddie Murphy[/size]
